text:
HEIKKI KIHERI: The
simplicity is what's

really important because
that's key to good science

that anybody can come
and do these measurements

without any bias and
without any mistakes.

And using an app on your
phone like Reality Scan

makes this as
simple as possible.

FRANZ BARTENBREITER:
Kappa Biotech

manages the largest chaga
mushroom cultivation
network in the world.

HEIKKI KIHERI: Chaga is a very
slow growing, highly potent

natural health product
made from the interaction

between the birch tree and the
fungus that grows within it.

The typical use
for a birch forest

would be in the paper
industry, or the trees

would stand for perhaps 20
years and would only net
a handful of euros per tree.

We offer in the same time
frame many tens higher return

on investment to the landowner
as we have an agreement

to harvest those
chocolates which

have been inoculated
in the trees
once they become large enough.

For us to know how well
the chagas are growing

in the forest, we need to
be able to measure them,

and the best way to measure
them is having a quick and easy,
reproducible technology.

FRANZ BARTENBREITER:
And that's where
Reality Scan comes into play.

Before we used to use just a
ruler, basically a caliper.

HEIKKI KIHERI: So when a
single person comes and does

a measurement and then a few
years later somebody else

goes and does it, you'll
end up with potentially

a big difference in
how it's measured.

Reality Scan allows us to go
and scan the conks on the tree
easily with our phones.

FRANZ BARTENBREITER: We use
Reality Scan to take a series

of pictures which will
form the 3D model,

and this 3D model can be
analyzed in the lab for its
volume.

HEIKKI KIHERI: It's all
marked in our database

according to each tree,
their GPS location,

and we can reproducibly do
this measurement every year.

So we have a very strong data
set going into the future.

Having our own inoculated forest
network across Finland really

guarantees that we have the only
long-term, sustainable source
of chaga going into the future.

Reality Scan mobile app is
one of our key research tools.

For us to be able to
measure this so accurately

allows us to get
the most chaga out

of the trees that are
inoculated at the right time,

and this gives the best return
on investment to the landowners.
